Purpose: Sequencing of genes associated with Hyper-IgE Syndrome to detect pathogenic variants for diagnostic assessment.
Container: EDTA (lavender) or ACD (yellow) tube for blood; approved saliva collection kit
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, library preparation kit, Next-Generation Sequencing instrument (e.g., Illumina MiSeq/NextSeq), PCR thermal cycler, centrifuge, Qubit Fluorometer, Agilent Bioanalyzer, bioinformatics software
